info.title: Splunk App for Infrastructure API Guide
info.description: This is Splunk App for Infrastructure (SAI) API documentation page.

tags.name: Entity
tags.description: A type of basic object in SAI. Entity endpoints handle basic entity CRUD operations

tags.name: Group
tags.description: A type of basic object in SAI. Group endpoints handle basic group CRUD operations

tags.name: Alert
tags.description: Alert indicates alert definitions. Alert endpoints handle CRUD operations on alert definitions stored internally as savedsearches

tags.name: AWS
tags.description: AWS utility endpoint to check any AWS related information like app execution environment

tags.name: VictorOps
tags.description: A type of basic object in SAI. VictorOps endpoints handle basic victorops related operations

get.description: Return a list of all saved entities

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: number of entities to skip, used in the context of pagination requests

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: State of the new entity. Value can only be either active or inactive

parameters.name: informational_dimensions
parameters.description: Informational dimensions of the new entity

parameters.name: identifier_dimensions
parameters.description: Identifier dimensions of the new entity

parameters.name: dimensions
parameters.description: All dimensions of the new entity

_key.description: The unique id of the created entity

get.summary: Get a single entity by ID
get.description: Return information of a single entity

400.description: Bad Request. Entity may not exist, or query parameter is in invalid format

post.summary: Update a single entity by name (ID)

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of entity that needs to be updated

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: State of the new entity. Value can only be either active or inactive

parameters.name: informational_dimensions
parameters.description: Informational dimensions of the new entity

parameters.name: identifier_dimensions
parameters.description: Identifier dimensions of the new entity

parameters.name: dimensions
parameters.description: All dimensions of the new entity

_key.description: The unique id of the created entity

400.description: Bad Request. Entity may not exist, or query parameter is in invalid format

delete.summary: Delete a single entity by name (ID)
delete.description: Delete a sinlge entity by name (ID)

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: name (ID) of the entity to be deleted

404.description: Cannot find the entity with id {entityID}

parameters.name: delete_query
parameters.description: query parameter to filter down to entities to delete

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: query parameters to filter the remaining entities to return

parameters.name: invert_delete
parameters.description: provide this parameter if you want to *NOT* delete the list of entities

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: provide this parameter to show the no of entities on page

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: number of groups to skip, used in the context of pagination requests

parameters.name: sort_key
parameters.description: provide this parameter to sort entities by key

parameters.name: sort_dir
parameters.description: provide this parameter to sort by direction

get.summary: Get metadata (that could include total count, health breakdown, etc) of entities

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: KV store query to match entities

200.description: Map of dimensions and values in metadata

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: KV store query to match entities

200.description: Map of dimensions and values in metadata

get.description: Returns an entry with all metric names filtered by dimensions along with their min, max information from the last 24 hours

200.description: List of metric names filtered by dimensions

get.summary: Return a list of a single metric average value by entity names
get.description: Return a list of a single metric average value by entity names

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: query parameters, "metric_name" is a required parameter in query

200.description: Return a list of a single metric average value by entity names

get.description: Return a list of all saved groups or filter by entityID

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: KV store query to match groups by name/title

parameters.name: filter_by_entity_ids
parameters.description: return any group contains this entityID parameter

parameters.name: filter_by_entity_names
parameters.description: return any group contains this entity name parameter

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: number of groups to skip, used in the context of pagination requests

409.description: Cannot create a group that already exists

parameters.name: delete_query
parameters.description: KV Store query to mach the groups to be deleted

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: KV store query to match groups by name/title

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: number of groups to skip, used in the context of pagination requests

404.description: Cannot find the group with id {groupID}!

get.description: Returns an entry with all unique titles of groups

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: KV store query to match groups

200.description: List of groups titles in metadata

get.description: Returns the count of all filtered groups, if query is an empty filter, count of all groups will be retrieved

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: KV store query to match groups

400.description: Group with id {groupID} cannot be found

post.description: Update an existing group by ID

parameters.name: groupID
parameters.description: ID of group that needs to be updated

404.description: Cannot delete a group that does not exist

get.description: Return a list of all alert savedsearches

400.description: Alert with the specified name already exists

get.summary: Get information about an individual alert savedsearches
get.description: Return a list of all alert savedsearches

404.description: Unable to get alert definition with given name

delete.description: Return a list of remaining alert savedsearches

get.description: Returns deployment type, ec2 or non-ec2

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: max number of settings to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: number of entities to skip, used in pagination-aware requests

typeId.description: Entity or group ID that alert is for

search.example: | mstats avg(_value) as "Avg" WHERE "host"="server.com" AND metric_name="memory.free" AND "index"="em_metrics" span=1m| stats list(Avg) as Avg, list(_time) as time | eval past_value=mvindex(Avg, 0), current_value=mvindex(Avg, 1), current_time=mvindex(time, 1)| fields - Avg, time| eval CRITICAL=5, WARNING=3, INFO=1| eval past_state=if(past_value >= -9.00719925474e+15 AND past_value < 77.0, INFO, if(past_value >= 77.0 AND past_value < 108.0, WARNING, if(past_value >= 108.0 AND past_value < 9.00719925474e+15, CRITICAL, "None")))| eval current_state=if(current_value >= -9.00719925474e+15 AND current_value < 77.0, INFO, if(current_value >= 77.0 AND current_value < 108.0, WARNING, if(current_value >= 108.0 AND current_value < 9.00719925474e+15, CRITICAL, "None")))| eval state_change=if(current_state > past_state, "degrade", if(current_state == past_state, "no", "improve"))| eval metric_name="memory.free",aggregation_method="Avg",managed_by_id="eyJob3N0IjogImFsYWJhbWEudXNhLmNvbSJ9",managed_by_type="entity",split_by="None",threshold_info_min=-9.00719925474e+15,threshold_info_max=77.0,threshold_warning_min=77.0,threshold_warning_max=108.0,threshold_critical_min=108.0,threshold_critical_max=9.00719925474e+15,ss_id="alabama.usa.com-memory.free-avg"| eval entity_id=managed_by_id | join type=inner max=0 entity_id [| inputlookup em_entities | rename _key as entity_id, title as entity_title]| fields - dimensions.*, informational_dimensions

items.description: Destination for notification, such as target email address

managed_by_id.description: Entity or group ID that alert is for

managed_by_type.description: Type of object that manages this alert

metric_spl.example: | mstats avg(_value) as "Avg" WHERE "host"="server.com" AND metric_name="memory.free" AND "index"="em_metrics" span=10s

items.description: Destination for notification, such as target email address
